casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

86-1687. Canton v. Stark Cty. Budget Comm.

Appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals, No. 84-D-14. On motion to consolidate with 87-133, Bd. of Commrs. of Stark Cty. v. Canton and 87-134, Bd. of Commrs. of Stark Cty. v. Canton. Motion denied. On motion to strike Propositions of Law Nos. 1, 2, 5 and the second half of 3. Motion denied. On motion to amend notice of cross-appeal and conditional notice of appeal. Motion denied.
